line.comment: * explanation of the new money meta on hard difficulty. Add-Ons 1.3: Minimal tutorials on insane.
* Add-Ons 1.3: On insane, ALL other unknown sectors fall to commonwealth control.
* Valid sector. Check if the faction exists.
* ZH 2.0 - introduce some delay so that player doesn't get spammed with messages
* Yaki revolution happens randomly 1-2 days after first player sector

sval.val: explanation of the new money meta on hard difficulty. Add-Ons 1.3: Minimal tutorials on insane.
Add-Ons 1.3: On insane, ALL other unknown sectors fall to commonwealth control.
Valid sector. Check if the faction exists.
ZH 2.0 - introduce some delay so that player doesn't get spammed with messages
Yaki revolution happens randomly 1-2 days after first player sector
